cause.description:
By helping sponsor a progressive's training, you'll be providing vital resources for an inspiring future leader to develop the skills, connections, and tools he or she needs to be successful.
CPL leaders represent the best and brightest up-and-coming leaders across the country. They are a highly diverse group of individuals from all stages and backgrounds of life that are changing the face of our country's leadership.
Since 2004, CPL has trained over 1,800 individuals and we need your help to continue investing in the next generation of progressive leaders.
1. Progressives must focus on long-term leadership development to be successful.
cause.mission: Our mission is to train people at every level of political involvement, from campaign staffers and community organizers to future candidates and non-profit directors.
cause.name: Sponsor A Progressive Leader
